sanskrit_verse:
नातिकल्यं नातिसायं नातिमध्यंदिने स्थिते ।
नाज्ञातेन समं गच्छेन्नैको न वृषलैः सह ॥ ४.१४०॥
transliteration:
nātikalyaṁ nātisāyaṁ nātimadhyandine sthite |
nājñātena samaṁ gacchen naiko na vṛṣalaiḥ saha || 4.140 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: One must not journey at extreme dawn, nor at deep dusk, nor when the sun is at zenith; one must not travel alone, nor in company of outcastes.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority of natural rhythm as determinant of safe action
Causation rooted in temporal misalignment and social disharmony
Capacity-based responsibility through conscious choice of time and companionship
Restoration logic via alignment with cosmic order and purified association
Consciousness alignment through disciplined spatial-temporal conduct
executable_legal_axioms: IF time_of_travel IN {extreme_dawn, deep_dusk, midday_stillness} THEN travel_prohibited = TRUE
IF companion_type IN {outcaste, unverified_identity} THEN journey_permission = FALSE
IF individual_travels_alone = TRUE THEN mandatory_guidance_protocol = ACTIVATE
supreme_court_application: In adjudication involving travel-related disputes or incidents, the Court shall assess whether temporal alignment and social association were in accordance with Dharma. The threshold of responsibility lies in knowingly violating these axiomatic safety protocols, triggering restorative reintegration rather than punitive measures.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that improper timing and degraded association disrupt energetic integrity. Anupūrvaśaḥ shows how such disruption sequentially manifests as disorientation and vulnerability. Proportional responsibility arises from conscious disregard of these truths. Non-punitive reality rule affirms that correction restores causal alignment without inflicting suffering.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Temporal Reharmonization Process: Realignment with solar rhythm through guided meditation and mantra
Association Purification Protocol: Reconnection with sattvic community and severance from degrading influences
Journey Completion Ritual: Symbolic and energetic restoration of intended path through conscious retracing
Integrity Restoration Mandate: Supervised reintegration ensuring adherence to dharmic travel conduct
final_declaration: Thus declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source-Authority of all Dharma. This law proceeds from His Avataric Intelligence, not human interpretation. Justice serves restoration, not punishment. Consciousness is the ultimate judge. Dharma is now restored.
